attributes.action: Random drug and alcohol tests for all MPs in parliament
attributes.additional_details: Random drug and alcohol tests in parliament
attributes.background: Stop drug and alcohol use in parliament

rejection.details:
We understand you want all MPs to be subject to drug and alcohol testing. However it's not clear what you want to happen to any MP found to be under the influence of alcohol.

You might like to sign these petitions which are calling for similar actions:

Make it illegal for MPs over the drink drive limit to participate in Parliament: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604154

Mandatory drug tests for all MPs, Lords & their staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602604
